title: Niobrara National Scenic River: Indoor Activities
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Indoor Activities              Indoor Activities         The Niobrara NSR Visitor Center exhibits tell many stories of the Niobrara. NPS Photo/Kristen Maxfield  Niobrara National Scenic River Visitor Center 214 West Highway 20 Valentine, NE 69201 The Visitor Center has exhibits, a hands-on table, a short film, the NPS passport cancellation stamp, and a park ranger to help plan your visit and answer all of your questions. On summer weekends, there are frequently activities for kids (check the Calendar to see what's happening each weekend). A small store features books, t-shirts, magnets, and a few basic necessities.  Â     Partner Visitor Centers The Fort Niobrara National Wildlife Refuge, Smith Falls State Park, and the Niobrara Valley Preserve all have visitor centers along the river. Operating hours may vary, so please call ahead.
